base_description: Analyzing the topology, we find 4 nodes and 4 branches in this circuit. For passive elements, the circuit contains 3 resistor(s). Energy is supplied through 1 current source(s). There are no controlled sources in this circuit. No measurements are configured. In total, this circuit comprises 4 circuit elements.

edits.instruction: Change the resistor (labeled 3) from 98m立 to 5m立.
Change the DC current source (labeled 1) from 94A to 18A.
Update resistance 1: change its value from 65立 to 100立.
